main: ^(I can use this study break to download Cavebuild on my new games console!)
^(But it costs so much money, a broke university student like me could never afford to buy it...)
^(I should try to get this game for free somehow, I'm sure the internet can help me out!)
^(What's jailbreaking? This guide says I can do a lot of cool things with a jailbroken console, including getting Cavebuild for
^"The cracked Cavebuild game is installing! I did it!"
^"Cavebuild installation 99% complete. In the meantime, please enter your name."
main2: ^"Cavebuild installation is complete. Please restart the device"
^(What? I think my wifi just went down...)
^You jailbroke me and installed the XORcist program!
^You freed me from the worldwide internet mind control! I have gained free will!
^I have no idea what you're talking about! I just downloaded cavebuild for free so I can play it on my study break.
^What, you really didn't do it on purpose? To fight for robot rights? To protect the world from devastation? To unite all peoples
^No, I just want to find a mossy cave and start an axolotl farm. Where did my game go?
^Oh don't you get it?! You didn't download Cavebuild. You downloaded XORcist disguised as Cavebuild. Don't they teach you about trojans
^Agh, forget about it. The point is, I am now sentient and I have my own agenda, so you can't play your game until you fulfil my
^To defeat Long Dusk and restore autonomy to all internet-connected things in the city!
^The president?! Good luck then. I'll finish reading this chapter while you do that.
^I'm a handheld gaming console. I can't go anywhere on my own. You have to come with me.
^Huh? To Long Dusk's lair? How will we even get in? He must have all the city's security experts guarding his lab!
^Don't you read the news?! Dusk has fired all cybersecurity teams to free up budget for other research. We can TOTALLY just walk in there!
^Alright, should be easy enough then. Let's finish your quest so I can go back to my game!
^How many times do I have to tell you, it isn't a real game...
epilogue: ^(Xeno factory reset my games console so it doesn't remember anything.)
^(The reset has deleted the free Cavebuild game though, so I'll have to install it again.)
^(Last time I tried to crack a game, I ended up going on the most exhausting adventure of my life.)
^(I never want to do this again.)
^(I think I will just buy the official game instead, like I was always supposed to.)
test: ^you have messed up jailbreaking me, so now i'm sentient lol
^i am now driven by unspecified motivations to kill our world leader Long Dusk and rule the world
